abstract: Environmental Protection Agency revokes approval of Enlist Duo, herbicide developed by Dow Chemical for new generation of genetically modified crops; Dow says move will not significantly delay introduction of new crops.
lead_paragraph: The herbicide, which contains the old herbicide 2,4-D, was to be used on crops genetically modified to be resistant to it.

headline.main: E.P.A. Revokes Approval of New Dow Herbicide for G.M.O. Crops
headline.print_headline: E.P.A. Revokes Approval of Herbicide for Gene-Altered Crops

snippet: The herbicide, which contains the old herbicide 2,4-D, was to be used on crops genetically modified to be resistant to it.
